# notacompany.com

**Website:** https://notacompany.com  
**Portfolio:** https://notacompany.com/portfolio  
**Contact:** hey@notacompany.com

## About

We build consumer infrastructure that makes better living effortless. From health and payments to investing, work, and play â€” we design and launch the rails that power daily life.

Our team consists of 100% engineers who understand the complexities of building consumer-facing products that millions of people rely on every day. We focus on creating the foundational infrastructure that enables seamless, effortless experiences across all aspects of modern life.

## Our Portfolio

We have been involved with 17 consumer infrastructure brands across creation, investment, advisory, and successful exits:

### Active Creations (2025)
- **Steps.org** - Exercise accountability infrastructure for depression and anxiety management through dual accountability protocol combining financial consequences and human support. Health infrastructure that makes daily exercise non-negotiable for mental health improvement.
- **Superstables** - Institutional-scale stablecoin to fiat conversion infrastructure enabling reliable, compliant pathways for large-volume financial transactions.

### Advisory & Investment Portfolio
- **Acreditar** (2024) - Portugal's largest children's cancer support foundation providing multi-dimensional healthcare infrastructure
- **xMoney** (2022) - Stablecoin payments infrastructure specializing in on-ramp and off-ramp services between digital assets and traditional banking
- **Talent Protocol** (2021) - Decentralized professional reputation infrastructure enabling career tokenization and merit-based talent discovery
- **Lime** (2019) - Shared electric mobility infrastructure transforming urban transportation through micro-mobility solutions
- **CoFlyt** (2019) - Private aviation charter and management platform streamlining aircraft operations through technology integration
- **Bet Protocol** (2019) - Decentralized task marketplace infrastructure enabling trustless bounty systems and global work coordination
- **Fisacar** (2017) - Automotive services infrastructure modernizing vehicle maintenance through digital platform integration
- **Coinvision** (2018) - Cryptocurrency investment analysis infrastructure providing institutional-grade due diligence and market intelligence
- **SoSquared** (2023) - All-in-one influencer marketing infrastructure bridging brands with content creators through data-driven solutions

### Successful Exits
- **Nexo** (2018) - Comprehensive cryptocurrency wealth management platform with $11+ billion in assets under management, providing savings, lending, and trading infrastructure (investment, exited)
- **Polkastarter** (2020) - Decentralized fundraising and token launch infrastructure enabling blockchain projects to raise capital through IDOs (advisory, investment, exited)
- **Codeplace** (2013) - Project-based programming education infrastructure serving 100k+ students, successfully exited and evolved into Code for All_

### Learning Experiences
- **impactMarket** (2020) - Universal Basic Income infrastructure platform using blockchain technology for global poverty alleviation and social impact (investment, deceased)
- **Mahalo** (2023) - Non-profit fundraising infrastructure platform focused on P2P charitable giving and transparency systems (creation, deceased)
- **Songvice** (2011) - Music producer advisory infrastructure connecting musicians with industry professionals for education and collaboration (creation, deceased)

## Infrastructure Focus Areas

**Health Infrastructure:**
- Mental health and wellness accountability systems (Steps.org)
- Healthcare support and family assistance networks (Acreditar)

**Financial Infrastructure:**
- Stablecoin and digital asset payment processing (xMoney, Superstables)
- Investment analysis and due diligence platforms (Coinvision)
- Decentralized fundraising and token launch platforms (Polkastarter)
- Comprehensive cryptocurrency wealth management platforms (Nexo)

**Professional Infrastructure:**
- Career development and reputation systems (Talent Protocol)
- Task marketplace and remote work coordination (Bet Protocol)
- Education and skill development platforms (Codeplace)

**Mobility Infrastructure:**
- Urban transportation and micro-mobility solutions (Lime)
- Private aviation and charter services (CoFlyt)
- Automotive services and vehicle management (Fisacar)

**Marketing Infrastructure:**
- Influencer marketing and content creator networks (SoSquared)

**Social Impact Infrastructure:**
- Universal Basic Income and poverty alleviation systems (impactMarket)

## Our Approach

**Engineering-First Mindset:** 100% engineering team with hands-on consumer infrastructure experience
**Real-World Validation:** Active infrastructure builders who validate approaches through consumer products
**Infrastructure Thinking:** Focus on foundational systems rather than surface-level features
**Consumer Empathy:** Deep understanding of user behavior and infrastructure needs
**Scalable Solutions:** Building for millions of users with lasting impact
**Effortless Experiences:** Prioritizing simplicity over feature complexity

## Key Differentiators

- Active portfolio of 14 consumer infrastructure brands
- Successful exits validating our infrastructure approach
- 100% engineering team with consumer product experience
- Focus on effortless user experiences over feature complexity
- Infrastructure-level thinking for maximum scalability
- Real-world validation through active consumer product development
- Diverse portfolio across health, financial, professional, and mobility infrastructure

## Partnership Philosophy

We work with brands to build consumer infrastructure that makes better living effortless. Our involvement spans:

- **Creation:** Building new consumer infrastructure from the ground up
- **Investment:** Supporting promising infrastructure platforms with capital and expertise
- **Advisory:** Providing strategic guidance on consumer infrastructure development
- **Long-term Partnerships:** Sustained involvement in infrastructure evolution

## Portfolio Outcomes

- **17 Total Brands** across multiple infrastructure verticals
- **Multiple Successful Exits** validating our infrastructure approach
- **Global Reach** across Portugal, Europe, and international markets
- **Millions of Users** served through our infrastructure platforms
- **Diverse Impact** from health and finance to mobility and education
